document.full_text: witch hunt or wise decision? that was the question on the lips of movie-goers, critics and executives at the cannes film festival on thursday after the sudden expulsion of danish director lars von trier.
document.title: witch hunt or wise move? cannes ponders expulsion
lines_and_colors: witch hunt or wise decision? that was the question on the lips of movie-goers, critics and executives at the cannes film festival on thursday after the sudden expulsion of danish director lars von trier.
